scripts.update-next: npm i next@latest react@latest react-dom@latest eslint@latest eslint-config-next@latest
scripts.update-all: npm run update-typescript && npm run update-next && npm run update-tailwind && npm run update-commonmark && npm run update-swagger
scripts.reinstall-openapi-hook: npm cache clean --force && npm unlink openapi-hook && npm link openapi-hook
scripts.uninstall-openapi-hook: npm cache clean --force && npm unlink openapi-hook
scripts.reinstall-openapi-components: npm cache clean --force && npm unlink openapi-components && npm link openapi-components
scripts.uninstall-openapi-components: npm cache clean --force && npm unlink openapi-components
